title.narrative: Further Contribution to the EU Emergency Trust Fund for Africa - to be distributed across Windows

description.narrative: This activity (Further Contribution to the EU Emergency Trust Fund for Africa - to be distributed across Windows) is a component of European Union Emergency Trust Fund for stability and addressing root causes of irregular migration and displaced persons in Africa reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Multilateral organisation' and a budget of £13,376,999. This component benefits Africa, regional, and works in the following sector(s): Public sector policy and administrative management, Facilitation of orderly, safe, regular and responsible migration and mobility, Material relief assistance and services . , with the following implementing partners: European Commission - Directorate-General for International Cooperation and Development. The start date is 01-02-2019 and the end date is 31-12-2020.
